9‚É£ The COVID-19 pandemic rages on and we‚Äôve seen nothing but total mismanagement and the infringement of personal liberties from the Biden Administration.

8‚É£ @POTUS‚Äô decisions to kneecap American energy have real effects. 

He canceled Keystone XL, illegally halted lease sales, and pushed heavy-handed regulations then asked OPEC to bail him out. End result: we import more oil from Russia than we produce in Alaska.

7‚É£ Where do we begin on the sorry state of our economy? Biden‚Äôs policies have led to inflation and supply chain crises, which have been utterly devastating. 

In North Dakota, inflation has soared 7.5% in a year. The American people deserve better.

6‚É£ Our voting system is working, but @JoeBiden wasted his first year complaining about "voting rights," a fake crisis far removed from reality.

5‚É£ The Afghanistan withdrawal was an abject failure and @POTUS bears the responsibility.

4‚É£ President Biden created a crisis at the southern border he now refuses to fix. A nation that cannot control its borders is not a nation.
